'''Jeffrey''' is a [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ma%C3%AEtre_d%27h%C3%B4tel maître d'hôtel] (head waiter) at [[Javu]], the restaurant [[Monica Geller|Monica]] works at in [[season 9]]. He is only mentioned, doesn't appear on screen.

Jeffrey is reportedly the funniest guy Monica has ever met. [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] is very jealous of this, since being funny "is [his] thing".
